Service Details: - Provides fire protection for the residents of the City of West Kelowna and Westbank First Nation- Offers public education on car seats, chimney fire safety, fire extinguishers, Fire Prevention Week, fire safety, home self-inspection, home escape planning, and interface fires- Consists of four fire halls:  Station 31, Old Okanagan Hwy; Station 32, Olalla Rd; Station 33, Westlake Rd; and Station 34, Gates Rd
